embed.title: Link al voto
embed.description:
Puoi votare su [Top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/965903240384376872/vote). Con ogni voto si ottengono {plusVoteTokens} più skip.
Tu hai {votes}.

howtouse.name: Come si usa l'emojiquiz?
howtouse.value:
1. Utilizzare </emojiquiz setup:{commandId}>.
2. Utilizzare </emojiquiz toggle:{commandId}>.
Dopo di che, tutto ha inizio.

whynotworking.name: Perché il quiz sulle emoji non funziona più?
whynotworking.value: Utilizzare </emojiquiz fix:{commandId}>. Se ancora non funziona, contattate l'assistenza [qui] (https://discord.gg/BQumAujuvk).

howtoskip.name: Cosa si può fare se non si trova il termine?
howtoskip.value: È possibile utilizzare il pulsante "Skip". Se non hai più salti, devi votare [qui](https://top.gg/bot/965903240384376872/vote). Con ogni voto si ottengono {plusVoteTokens} salti. Attualmente hai {votes} salti.

embed.title: Collega il tuo account
embed.description: - Ora devi verificare che questo account ti appartenga. Vai nel gioco. Impostazioni > Altre impostazioni > Token API > Mostra. Una volta ottenuto questo token, devi cliccare sul pulsante verde "Fornisci token API" e inserirlo lì. Dopodiché, clicca su "Invia".

valorant.already-linked: {x} Il tuo account VALORANT è già collegato.
valorant.title: Collega il tuo account VALORANT
valorant.description:
Clicca sul pulsante "Collega" per collegare l'account.
- Alla fine vedrai una pagina JSON che ha un parametro chiamato "Codice". Copia questo, clicca su "Specifica codice" e inseriscilo lì.
- Puoi rimuovere il collegamento con </unlink valorant:{commandId}>.

embed.title: Menù di Aiuto
embed.description:
## Generale
- Il bot funziona con comandi `/`, rendendo più facile l'uso del bot.
- È necessario selezionare la categoria desiderata nel menu sottostante.
- Se hai domande, sentiti libero di chiedere nel [Server di Supporto](https://discord.gg/BQumAujuvk), dove puoi fare domande sul bot o ottenere supporto. Lì verranno anche fornite informazioni su aggiornamenti, manutenzioni e novità.

## Annunci
{announcements}
Nota: Usa </bot info:1058376602515411061> per ottenere più informazioni su di me.

embed.description:
## Verwalte das System
- Liste: Erhalte einer Liste der aktuellen Kanäle
- Debuggen: Teste und behebe Fehler
- Zurücksetzen: Setze die Einstellungen zurück
- Toggle: Aktiviere oder deaktiviere das System
- Kanal hinzufügen: Füge einen Kanal hinzu
- Kanal entfernen: Entferne einen Kanal

## Autorollen
- Liste: Erhalte einer Liste der aktuellen Autorollen
- Debuggen: Teste und behebe Fehler
- Zurücksetzen: Setze die Einstellungen zurück
- Toggle: Aktiviere oder deaktiviere die Autorollen
- Rollen hinzufügen: Füge eine Autorolle hinzu
- Rollen entfernen: Entferne eine Autorolle

embed.title: Dat Bot einrichten
embed.description:
- {y} Einrichtung gestartet.
- {y} Überprüfe Rechte.
- {y} Überprüfe Logging-Kanal.
- {y} Einrichtung fertig.

send_poll.poll-message-not-found: {x} Die Umfrage Nachricht wurde nicht gefunden.

rank.no-arguments: {x} Bitte gebe einen Riot-namen (Als Beispiel DGamet#1687) an oder logge dich mit </link valorant:{commandId} ein.
rank.invalid-username: {x} Der angegebene Nutzername ist nicht valid. Bitte überprüfe deine Eingabe.
rank.user-no-data: {x} Zu diesem Nutzer wurden keine Daten gefunden.

matchhistory.not-linked: {x} Du hast dein Konto nicht verlinkt. Nutze </link valorant:{commandId}>, um dein Konto zu verlinken.
matchhistory.wrong-shard: {x} Bitte logge dich erneut ein. Vorher musst du dich mit </unlink valorant:{commandId}> wieder ausloggen.
matchhistory.account-not-found: {x} I have not found the linked account.
matchhistory.defaultDescription:
## Select a match
- Select one of the matches.
- Due to a limitation of Discord, Dat Bot can only display the last 25 matches.

- Note: Anyone can view the information about the game as long as that person can read this message.
matchhistory.no-matches: {x} I did not recieve any matches.

descriptions.defaultInMenu:
## Wähle etwas aus
- Wähle einen der unteren Buttons, um Informationen über dieses Spiel zu erhalten
 - Spieler & Queues: Informationen über die einzelnen Spieler und wer mit wem gequeuet hat.
 - Ergebnis & Teams: Informationen zu den jeweiligen Teams und das Endergebnis.

- Bemerke: Jeder kann die Informationen über das Spiel einsehen, solange diese Person diese Nachricht lesen kann.

interface.footer: Join the Creator channel to create a TempVoice channel.

beta.closed: {x} This feature is currently in a closed beta. If you would like to try out the feature, you can request this on the [Support Server](https://discord.gg/BQumAujuvk).
beta.open: This feature is currently in open beta.

tempvoice.missing-permissions-setup:
{x} To be able to use the TempVoice system, I still need the following permissions:
{permissions}
tempvoice.not-in-vc: {x} You are not in a voice channel.
tempvoice.not-in-tv-channel: {x} You are not in a temporary voice channel.
tempvoice.missing-permissions: {x} You must either be the owner of the temporary voice channel or a server administrator to perform this action.
tempvoice.feature-not-available: {x} This feature is not yet available.
tempvoice.user-not-on-guild: {x} This user is not on this server.
tempvoice.permissions-admin: {x} To do this, you must be a server administrator.
tempvoice.permissions-mod: {x} To do this, you must be a server administrator, the owner of this channel or a channel moderator.
tempvoice.permissions-owner: {x} To do this, you must own the channel.
tempvoice.is-owner: {x} This user is the owner of this server.
tempvoice.is-admin: {x} This user is an administrator of this server.
tempvoice.blocked:
{x} You have been blocked from the TempVoice system and can no longer use it.
- This was done by a member of the server and is **not** global.
- You can find more information [here](https://docs.datbot.xyz/features/our-features/tempvoice).

logs.info: ## The logs for this channel will be sent here from now on.
logs.inactivity: {i}・Since the last user ({user}) has **left** {channel}, it has been deleted.
logs.bitrate: {i}・{user} has set the bit rate to **{bitrate}**.
logs.name: {i}・{user} has set the name to **{name}**.
logs.userlimit: {i}・{user} has set the user limit to **{userlimit}**.
logs.takeover: {i}・{user} has **taken over** the channel. {member} was the previous owner.
logs.removeallmoderators: {i}・{user} has **removed** all channel moderators. The channel moderators were: {mods}
logs.deleted: {i}・Since {user} has left the channel, {channel} has been **deleted**. There were no more users in the channel.
logs.videoquality: {i}・{user} has set the video quality to **{videoquality}**.

visible.success: {y} The channel has been made visible.

invisible.success: {y} The channel has been made invisible.

bitrate.title: Set the bit rate (in Kbps)
bitrate.label: Bitrate
bitrate.bitrate-update-success: {y} The bit rate was set to **{bitrate}kbps**.
bitrate.bitrate-update-info: {y} The bit rate was set to **{bitrate}kbps**, as a higher boost level is required for {reqBitrate} or this bit rate is not available.
bitrate.bitrate-update-info-1: {y} The bit rate was set to **8kbps** as this is the minimum number.

name.title: Set the name of the channel
name.label: Name

userlimit.title: Set the user limit
userlimit.label: User limit
userlimit.success: {y} The user limit has been set to **{limit}**.
userlimit.success-without-limit: {y} The user limit has been set to **infinite**.

delete.continue-deleteable-error: {x} I do not have permission to delete the channel.

embed.description:
## Delete channel
- Are you sure you want to delete this TempVoice channel? If so, click on <:1check:1201578213831356517>. If you want to cancel this process, click on <:1ban:1201576397798379600>.
- Note that you cannot undo the deletion of a TempVoice channel.

moderate.description:
## Quick actions
- <:crown:1202717638447468605>・Take over channel
- <:trash:1202716962489110609>・Delete channel
- <:1lock:1201576417897488535>・Ban channel
- <:ban:1202712066394423326>・Ban user
- <:unmod:1202716452860461087>・Remove all channel moderators
## Advanced moderation
- Click on the <:1users:1201580813574230188> emoji in the interface to manage users. 
- Click on the <:1bolt:1201576407965376533> emoji in the interface to manage the channel.
## Note
- To be able to remove all channel moderators at the same time, you must first take over the channel.

privacy.description:
## Explanation
- <:1lock:1201576417897488535>・Lock the channel
- <:1lockopen:1201585638609272832>・Unlock the channel
- <:1eye:1201585529431527434>・Make the channel visible
- <:1eyeslash:1201585541402079302>・Make the channel invisible

region.description:
## Set the channel region
- Select the new region in the lower select menu. The old region is selected by default.
## What changes the channel region?
- To answer this question, I recommend reading the [Support article](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/1500007645701-Voice-Regions-on-Discord-FAQ).

users.description:
## explanation
- <:invite:1202708818392522853>・Invite user
- <:uninvite:1202708805851414539>・Remove invitation
- <:ban:1202712066394423326>・Ban user
- <:unban:1202712377175449730>・Unban user
- <:kick:1202714648990720071>・Kick user
- <:user:1202704216041455677>・Transfer ownership
- <:modadd:1202713237964062841>・Add moderator
- <:unmod:1202716452860461087>・Remove moderator

videoquality.description:
## Set the video quality
- Select the new quality in the lower select menu. The old quality is selected by default.
videoquality.success: {y} The video quality has been set to **{mode}**.

description.no-creator-channel:
## How to create a channel
- You need to join the creator channel to create a temporary voice channel. The bot will automatically create a voice channel for you.
- Note: This server does not have a Creator Channel
## How does the interface work?
- Privacy: Here you can lock, unlock, make the channel visible and invisible.
- Manage channel: Manage name, region, user limit, status and bitrate.
- Manage users: Ban, unban or kick users. You can also invite users and transfer the owner.
- Moderation: Only for server moderators: They can use this to manage the channel.
- Help: This is this menu. It should help you to understand the system.
## Your permissions
- Owner of a channel: {tempvoiceOwner}
- Server moderator: {serverMod}
- Has moderation role: {modrole}
- Blocked: {blocked}

setup.too-many-channels-1: {x} This server has too many channels. Please delete **1 channel** so that the system can be used or select an existing channel.
setup.too-many-channels-2: {x} This server has too many channels. Please delete **{amount} channels** so that the system can be used or select an existing channel.

type.description:
## Select the type from
- Quick: Use the default settings and create a new category and two new channels, one for interface (text channel) and another for creating (voice channel).
- Manual: Set the creator channel.
## Information
- You can continue to change the settings afterwards with </tempvoice settings:0>.

quick.label: Quick
quick.description: Creates the channels and uses the default settings.

setup.success: {y} The system has been set up. Now create your own voice channel in {channel}! 🎉
setup.description:
## Set up TempVoice
- This system allows you to create temporary voice channels that are deleted when they are no longer in use.
- The user who created it has full control without having permissions over other channels.
- Server moderators still have the ability to take over and moderate the channel.

manuel.defaultdescription:
## Select the Creator channel
- This channel will become the Creator channel.
- You must join the Creator channel to create a temporary voice channel.
manuel.description:
## Information
- Success. The Creator channel is now {channel}.
- Now select the channel in which the interface message is to be sent.
manuel.description-1:
## Information
- Success. The interface message was sent in {channel}.
- To change other settings, such as category, system settings or similar, use </tempvoice settings:0>.
- To manage the system, you must be an administrator.
manuel.placeholder-2: Select channel for sending the interface.

invite.description:
## Invite a user
- If you want a user to be able to join even if the channel is blocked, use the select menu under this embed to select the user.
- You can also enter the name in the select menu, then the user will be suggested to you.
- To remove the invitation, click on the emoji <:uninvite:1202708805851414539> under Manage users and enter the user there.
invite.already: {x} The user has already been invited.
invite.banned: {x} I cannot invite {user} because he has been banned from the voice channel.

ban.description:
## Ban a user
- If you want to ban a user, enter them in the Select menu below.
 - They can then no longer enter the voice channel and, if they are currently in this voice channel, will be kicked from it.
- You can also search for the user name, so the user will be suggested.
- To unban a user, you can click on the emoji <:unban:1202712377175449730> in the Manage users menu and enter the user there.
ban.success: {y} {user} was banned from the voice channel.
ban.success-info:
{y} {user} has been banned from the voice channel.
- I have removed {user} from this voice channel because he was in it.
ban.user-admin: {x} You cannot ban administrators from a TempVoice channel.
ban.user-disconnect-error: {x} I could not remove {user} from this voice channel.
ban.user-yourself: {x} You cannot ban yourself from the TempVoice channel.

kick.description:
## Kick a user
- If you want to kick a user, enter them in the select menu below.
 - They **can** then **re-enter** the voice channel, but if they are currently in this voice channel, they will be kicked from it.
- You can also search for the user name, so the user will be suggested.
kick.already: {x} {user} is not in this voice channel.
kick.success: {y} {user} has been kicked. However, they can rejoin as long as they can see the channel and join it.

modadd.placeholder: Select a user to become a moderator.
modadd.description:
## Add moderator
- If you want a user to become a moderator, use the select menu below this embed to choose them. 
- Add moderators
 - Kick users
 - Lock and unlock the channel
 - Change the name
 - Change the user limit
 - Invite users
 - Remove invitations
- You can also enter the name in the select menu, then the user will be suggested to you.
- To remove the moderator status, click on the emoji <:unmod:1202716452860461087> under Manage users and enter the user there.
modadd.owner-you: {x} You are the owner and are therefore automatically a channel moderator.
modadd.max-reached: {x} You can only add a maximum of {limit} channel moderators.

modrem.placeholder: Select a user to be removed as a moderator
modrem.description:
## Remove moderator
- If you want to remove the moderator status of a user, use the select menu under this embed to select the user.
- The user will no longer have moderation permissions.
- You can also enter the name in the select menu, then the user will be suggested to you.
modrem.success: {y} {user} is no longer a TempVoice moderator.
modrem.owner-you: {x} You are the owner and are therefore automatically a channel moderator.

ownerset.description:
## Transfer ownership rights
- If you want to transfer ownership rights to a user, use the select menu under this embed to select them.
- You **will** lose **all permissions**.
- You can also enter the name in the select menu, then the user will be suggested to you.
ownerset.not-owner: {x} You are not the owner of the channel. If you want to take it over, click on "Moderation" in the interface and then on the emoji <:crown:1202717638447468605>.
ownerset.success: {y} {user} is now the new owner and therefore you no longer have permissions if you are not an administrator on the server anyway.
ownerset.not-in-channel: {x} {user} must be in this channel to become the new owner.

unban.description:
## Unban a user
- If you want to unban a user, enter them in the select menu below.
 - They can then re-enter the voice channel.
- You can also search for the user name and the user will be suggested.

uninvite.placeholder: Select a user from whom you want to remove the invitation.
uninvite.description:
## Remove invitation
- If you want a user's invitation to be removed, use the select menu under this embed to select them.
- They will no longer be able to join the channel if it is blocked.
- You can also enter the name in the select menu and the user will be suggested to you.
uninvite.success: {y} The invitation from {user} has been removed.

takeover.already: {x} You are already the owner of the channel {channel}.
takeover.success:
{y} You have **taken over**
- {user} no longer has permissions.

removeallmods.already: {x} There are no TempVoice channel moderators.
removeallmods.success:
{y} All channel moderators have been removed:
{mods}

resetsystem.description:
## Reset the settings
- You no longer want to use this system? If so, reset the settings with this.
- You cannot undo this.
- Feel free to give feedback on why you no longer want to use the system.

- If you are sure and want to reset the settings, click on <:1check:1201578213831356517>. If you want to cancel this process, click on <:1ban:1201576397798379600>.

defaultname.success-1: {y} The default name has been updated.
defaultname.success-2: {y} The default name has been reset.

defaultuserlimit.success-1: {y} The default user limit has been updated.
defaultuserlimit.success-2: {y} The default user limit has been reset.
defaultuserlimit.not-valid: {x} The specified user limit is not valid. Please enter a number between **1** and **99** or enter "max" to allow an infinite number of users.

command.description:
## Manage the settings
- <:1bolt:1201576407965376533>・Manage the channel that is created when you join the creator channel: name, permissions, bitrate, category & user limit.
- <:1check:1201578213831356517>・Manage the system: set this back, disable/enable this, test the system or view the settings.
- <:user:1202704216041455677>・Moderation settings: Logging, block user and moderation role

block.description:
## Block a user
- This user can then no longer manage settings and create TempVoice channels.
- The user must not be an administrator, must not have the moderation role and must not be the owner.
- Select the user to block in the user select menu. You can also search by username or ID.

category.already: {x} The category is already the default category or fallback category.
category.success: {y} The default category has been updated.

fallback.already: {x} The category is already the default category or fallback category.
fallback.no-default: {x} There is no default category. A default category must first be set.
fallback.success: {y} The fallback category has been updated.

loggingchannel.success: {y} The logging channel was set to {channel}.

moderationrole.role-is-everyone: {x} This role is `@everyone` and can therefore not be used.
moderationrole.success: {y} The moderation role was set to {role}.
moderationrole.description:
## Moderation role
- <:note:1202703281055604787>・Set the moderation role back
- <:1eye:1201585529431527434>・See the current moderation role
## Information
- The moderation role has all authorizations and can therefore manage TempVoice channels completely. Exceptions: Set owner, add channel moderators and remove channel moderators. However, you can take over the channel and thus also manage this.

unblock.placeholder: Select the user to remove the block.
unblock.description:
## Remove the block
- Banned users can no longer manage settings or create TempVoice channels.
- Unban a user by specifying them in the user select menu under this embed. You can also search by username or ID.

defaultname.success-reset: {y} The default name has been reset.
defaultname.success-1: {y} The default name has been updated.
defaultname.title: Set the default name
defaultname.label: Name

defaultbitrate.not-valid: {x} The specified bitrate is not valid. It must be between **8kbps** and **384kbps**.
defaultbitrate.success-reset: {y} The default bit rate has been reset.
defaultbitrate.success-1: {y} The default bit rate **{set}kbps** was set because **{input}kbps** is not possible. This may be due to the boost level, among other things.
defaultbitrate.success-2: {y} The default bit rate was set to **{input}kbps**.
defaultbitrate.title: Set the default bitrate
defaultbitrate.label: Bitrate

defaultuserlimit.not-valid: {x} The specified user limit is not valid. This must be between **1** and **99**. If you want to have infinite, enter "max" in the form.
defaultuserlimit.success-reset: {y} The default user limit has been reset.
defaultuserlimit.success-1: {y} The user limit was set to **{limit}**.
defaultuserlimit.title: Set the default user limit
defaultuserlimit.label: User limit

defaultcategory.description:
## Set the category for temporary voice channels
- Due to a limitation of Discord to have only 50 channels per category, Dat Bot offers the function to use a category if the first one is full. This function is called "Fallback".

- To select the default category, use the Select Menu "Select the default category."
- To select the fallback category, use the Select Menu "Select a fallback category."

blockshow.description-2:
## Blocked users
- There are no banned users.

loggingreset.success: {y} The logging settings have been reset.

loggingtest.toggle-fix: - Toggle: Use </tempvoice settings:0>, click on the button with the emoji <:user:1202704216041455677> and then on the emoji <:image4:1202697412012154890>, then on <:note:1202703281055604787> or click on the button "Activate system" at the bottom.
loggingtest.logging-not-existing-fix: - Logging channel: Select a logging channel by using </tempvoice settings:0>, <:user:1202704216041455677> and then on the emoji <:image4:1202697412012154890>, then on "Select a channel for logging."
loggingtest.logging-deleted-error: - Logging channel: This was deleted (Old ID: {id}).
loggingtest.logging-deleted-fix: - Creator channel: Select the new logging channel by using </tempvoice settings:0>, <:user:1202704216041455677> and then on the emoji <:image4:1202697412012154890>, then select the Select Menu "Select a channel for logging."
loggingtest.permissions-error: - I am missing the following permissions in {channel}: {missing}
loggingtest.permissions-fix: - Permissions: You have to give the bot the permissions.

logging.description:
## Logging
- <:note:1202703281055604787>・Enable or disable logging
- <:1ban:1201576397798379600>・Reset the logging settings
- <:1check:1201578213831356517>・Test the logging system for errors
- <:1eye:1201585529431527434>・See the logging settings
- Set logging channel: Use the Select Menu "Choose a channel for logging".
## Information
- Logging works like the Discord Audit Log, except that it is all actions involving a TempVoice channel.
- If the system is disabled, the logs will not be sent.

moderationrole_show.description-1:
## Moderation role
- The moderation role is currently {role}.
moderationrole_show.description-2:
## Moderation role
- There is currently no moderation role.

settings_channel.description:
## Manage the default channel
- <:image4:1202697412012154890>・Set the default name
- <:volume:1202705024057081856>・Set the default bitrate
- <:user:1202704216041455677>・Set the default user limit
- <:globe:1202703306527481917>・Set the default category
## Additional information
- To set the creator channel, use the select menu "Select the creator channel". 
- The following variables can be used for the default name
 - {id}・The ID of the user
 - {username}・The name of the user
 - {servername}・The nickname. If none is specified, the user name is used.
- For the bit rate, you can either specify the bit rate in kbps or "max". This will automatically select the maximum possible bit rate.

settings_moderation.description:
## Moderation settings
- <:image4:1202697412012154890>・Logging
- <:image7:1202697417326338078>・Block user
- <:user:1202704216041455677>・Remove block
- <:1eye:1201585529431527434>・Display all blocked users
- <:globe:1202703306527481917>・Set or remove moderation role
## More info
- Logging: It works in principle like the Discord Audit Log, but whenever something is changed on a TempVoice channel, a message is sent to this channel. 
- Moderation role: Members who have this role are basically treated like channel owners. They can set everything on a TempVoice channel, except:
 - Add channel moderators
 - Remove channel moderators
 - Transfer owner (but you can take over the channel)

settings_system.description:
## Manage the system
- <:trash:1202716962489110609>・Reset the system
- <:1lock:1201576417897488535>・Activate or deactivate the system.
- <:1check:1201578213831356517>・Test the system. 
- <:1eye:1201585529431527434>・See the settings.
## More information
## Toggle
- If the system is currently activated, it will be deactivated.
- The system will no longer function.
- The data will not be deleted.

testsystem.permissions-error: - Permissions: The following permissions are missing: {missing}
testsystem.permissions-fix: - Permissions: You have to give the bot the permissions.
testsystem.toggle-fix: - Toggle: Use </tempvoice settings:0>, click on the button with the emoji <:1check:1201578213831356517> and then on the emoji <:1lock:1201576417897488535> or click on the button "Activate system" at the bottom.
testsystem.creator-channel-deleted-error: - Creator channel: This has been deleted (Old ID: {id}).
testsystem.creator-channel-deleted-fix: - Creator channel: Select the new creator channel by using </tempvoice settings:0>, clicking on the button with the emoji <:1bolt:1201576407965376533> and then the select menu "Select the creator channel".
testsystem.default-category-deleted-error: - Default category: This has been deleted (Old ID: {id}).
testsystem.default-category-deleted-fix: - Default category: Select the new default category by using </tempvoice settings:0>, clicking on the button with the emoji <:1bolt:1201576407965376533>, then the button with the emoji <:globe:1202703306527481917> and there the Select Menu "Select the default category".
testsystem.fallback-category-deleted-error: - Fallback category: This has been deleted (Old ID: {id}).
testsystem.fallback-category-deleted-fix: - Fallback category: Select the new fallback category by using </tempvoice settings:0>, clicking on the button with the emoji <:1bolt:1201576407965376533>, then the button with the emoji <:globe:1202703306527481917> and there the Select Menu "Select the fallback category".
